attributes.title: Depicts Animal Porn !!!!
attributes.review: This is so horrifying all I wanted was to support our president but instead it put animal porn ads in the app and on my phone !! It was so triggering to me that I had multiple seizures and collapsed and was rushed to the Emergency Room. 🤕 I heard how Trump  could be connected to animal sex trafficking rings but I never wanted to believe the radical LEFT!!! I sobbed for hours after opening this app 😭 PLEASE fix this !!! 🇰🇷Trump 2020🇺🇸 🟦Blue Lives Matter🟦     🐬Save The Dolphins🐬 🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: This is 4 Trump
attributes.review: This is a terrible appp. 👎🏽This is for Trump you big fat  white nasty not white.(orange) . you is the worst president ever. You is the most nastiest person who can walk this earth. What kind of president can treat Poc diffferent just because our skin color . What kind of president try to build a wall for others not to come in United States. Last time I checked this is not your land. Lastly, you need sum got2be glue for your wig sir. Have a terrible day. Obama 4 president 😘👍🏽

attributes.title: Bad review:
attributes.review: This app caused a horrible virus on my phone, causing the surrounding apps to turn ORANGE. Worst app ever created 😓. Soon my house started filling up with tangerines! I can’t breath, and when I tried to open one of them they were rotten! Soon rats started crawling to the rotten oranges to claim them as their own, not before traumatizing my pet platypus! Do not download! This app has brought horrible things for my family, especially my platypus.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Honestly there was a lot of fake news, with I didn’t appreciate. Took very long to download, which was annoying nag so I did other things like bully serial killers. Very boring didn’t understand how it worked. The app was very bright and it attracted moths which kept attacking my face. I hate moths 😖 I yelled at my pet chair to look at it and he thought it was horrible also. Don’t approve. I am a professional reviewer for the App Store.

attributes.title: This app has lagged unlike any other app I’ve ever had
attributes.review: I was just trying to support my king, daddy trump🥵, but this app took literally four hours to download. I held out just because anything for my king, only to find that the app itself lags just as much. It took about 10 tries before it let me in, then just crashed from there on. I usually say anything for my king daddy trump but this app was just not it.

attributes.title: TAKE THIS DOWN!!
attributes.review: horrible app!! when the app is open, there is a screeching, piercing sound that comes from my phone, and only when this app is open. My whole family ran out of the house thinking it was the fire alarm. This sound makes my dog bark like crazy!! He was trying to bite my phone, ripped it out of my hands, and damaged it! Do not download this app unless you wanted a broken phone and damaged ear drums.

attributes.title: Really..?
attributes.review: this app is incredibly stupid. it took ages to load and frankly i could grow a beard within the amount of time it took.... not to mention who would support trump after he drop kicked my 2 year old child? he saw my family, walked up to them, and started “break dancing” yelling “TRUMP DANCE TRUMP DANCE TRUMP DANCE” who would want a toddler doing a job that is made for an actual intellectual... not to mention he stands up as straight as elton john. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Racist App
attributes.review: I used to hate Donald trump, and I still do, but this made my anger at him even worse. As soon as I opened the app, it sent my locations to ICE (reminder that ICE should be abolished) and deported my whole family. Though I’ve always disliked my eldest son, I did not want him to be gone forever as he pays the gas bill. So now I will be expecting trump himself to pay for the bill. Would rate 0 stars if possible. Extremely racist app.

attributes.title: I can’t believe it
attributes.review: This app is astoundingly horrible. I only wanted to see how stupid Trump was and how much slander he shares to the ignorant people of America. I can’t believe that the Cheeto was even allowed to run for president with him only having two brain cells. I’m heartbroken to say that this app is even more dumb then trump. This is because it compiles the stupid from all over the USA and shoves it into on app. This app is terrifying and I lost brain cells downloading it.

attributes.title: App did not work??
attributes.review: Yeah so I downloaded this app to support a qualified candidate for the 2020 election and it just promoted this old reality tv star guy with a bad sun tan? I thought it was gonna show a candidate who was qualified and prepared to run our country in this pandemic but instead it was some weird joke and showed like the worst person. Maybe the app got hacked?? 0/10 waste of my time, tell me when you get the bug fixed.
